channel.title: R on Just Readr The Instructions
channel.description: Recent content in R on Just Readr The Instructions

item.title: BTC Market Cap Shiny
item.description: LinkedIn Last week I was invited to publish a short article about the recent news of Bitcoin gaining a billion USD in market cap over last week. I believed that the best way to contribute my unique view was to create a small application similar to many of the analytics projects and dashboards that I develop and maintain as part of my current position. The resulting article can be viewed here on LinkedIn: https://www.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
